author: jerenkrantz
msg: (IOV_MAX): Define to 16 if we don't have IOV_MAX previously defined.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow serf to work with APR 0.9.x.
(handler_baton_t): Make outstanding reqs an apr_atomic_t on 0.9.x.
(open_connections): Conditionalize the APR 0.9.x socket creation API change.
* configure.in: Tell autoconf we'll work with APR 0 and APR-util 0.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add NMAKE style (Win32) makefile for building serf on Windows. Tested with
With this patch, you could build serf with command like this:

author: jerenkrantz
msg: serfmake: add install target; support --with-apr param to find APR & APR-util;
(main): Build up a parameter map of command line args; pass params to cmds.
(cmd_build, cmd_check): Give Builder the parameter list.
(Builder.__init__): Call APR/APUConfig with the apr params; set libdir,
(Builder.load_deps): Store our built header list in ourselves.
(Builder.install_target): Copy headers and libraries to our destination.
(ConfigScript.__init__): Append extra search dirs to our list.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: (process_connection): If we see a HUP, return an error.
